snippet: Like the 130R concept unveiled earlier on Monday, a production version of the coupe concept would be targeted at millennial buyers and would carry a sub-$25,000 price tag.
abstract: Like the 130R concept unveiled earlier on Monday, a production version of the coupe concept would be targeted at millennial buyers and would carry a sub-$25,000 price tag.
lead_paragraph: Introduced on Monday, Jan. 9: Chevrolet Tru 140S concept.

headline.main: Chevrolet Tru 140S Concept Strikes a Sinuous Stance at Cobo Center
